Question
========

Random sampling (*random sampling*) occurs when

Answerlist
----------

* The sample is representative of the population.
* The sample does not systematically deviate from the population.
* Every member of the population has an equal chance of being in the sample.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The sample is a representative reflection of the population...: Incorrect
* The sample does not systematically deviate from the population: Incorrect
* Every member of the population has an equal chance of being included in the sample...: Correct
